chunks.zh: 结婚是喜欢重要还是门当户对重要
chunks.en: Is love more important in marriage, or is it family background more important?

chunks.zh: 最近遇到了一个喜欢的但是家境很一般(家庭情况复杂)对象，op 是本地人属于自己吃饱全家不饿的那种，家里条件还可以的(父母退休金挺多、家里有住房、没有贷款有存款);对方家里条件一般,婚后家里很难提供支持
chunks.en: Recently, I met someone I like, but their family background is very average (complex family situation). I (OP) am a local and can support myself, and my family conditions are okay (parents have good pensions, own a house, no loans, and have savings); The other party's family conditions are average, and they will hardly be able to provide support after marriage.

chunks.zh: op 在恋爱的初期很上头，现在过了上头的阶段开始理性了,在考虑这方面问题了，尤其是以后如果家里可以蹭饭，父母可以提供经济上支持，父母可以帮忙带小孩这些会极大提高生活质量
chunks.en: OP was very impulsive at the beginning of the relationship, but now that the infatuation stage has passed, I've become more rational and am considering these issues, especially how much it would improve the quality of life if I could have free meals at home, financial support from my parents, and help with childcare.

chunks.zh: 而且 op 父母最近经历了一场手术，深刻体会到老人生病照顾是真的挺辛苦的
chunks.en: Also, OP's parents recently underwent surgery, and I deeply realized that taking care of sick elderly parents is really hard.

chunks.zh: 喜欢更重要，你遇到过多少自己心动的？但是门当户对的同一个小区里就有很多。
chunks.en: Love is more important. How many people have you truly been attracted to? But there are many with similar backgrounds in the same neighborhood.

chunks.zh: 重要程度打分，满分 5 分：* 情绪稳定，5 分。任何矛盾的产生都是沟通的问题，而情绪稳定是良好沟通的保证。* 门当户对，4 分。家庭差距过大，最大的影响就是会产生不同的价值观，从而导致看待事情和处理事情上存在较大差异，这也是矛盾主要产生点。* 父母满意，3 分。父母不看好的婚姻，必然会有家庭矛盾。要两个人一条心，且付出极大努力才能改善。但凡有一个人不积极改善关系，这个矛盾就会放大。* 三观契合，3 分。三观相同不太可能，契合这个说法就比较合理，允许有不同，但是互相尊重对方的想法也很重要。如果两个人在看待问题的角度不一样，很难互相适应，必然有一方会忍让，久之则易爆发矛盾。* 赚钱能力，3 分。贫贱夫妻百事哀。* 颜值，2 分。颜值不喜欢的话，可能看着看着就烦了。ps: 喜欢不列入打分了，因为喜欢是多方面结合的整体感觉，每个人喜欢的点也不同，很难客观的去评价。
chunks.en: Importance rating, out of 5 points: * Emotional stability, 5 points. Any conflict arises from communication problems, and emotional stability is a guarantee of good communication. * Compatibility, 4 points. A large family gap will have the greatest impact, which is that it will produce different values, which will lead to large differences in the way of looking at things and dealing with things. This is also the main point of conflict. * Parents' satisfaction, 3 points. A marriage that parents don't approve of will inevitably have family conflicts. Two people must be of one mind and make great efforts to improve it. If one person does not actively improve the relationship, this conflict will be amplified. * Agreement on values, 3 points. It is unlikely that the three views are the same. The argument of agreement is more reasonable. It is allowed to have differences, but it is also important to respect each other's ideas. If two people have different perspectives on things, it is difficult to adapt to each other, and one party will inevitably give in, which will easily lead to conflicts over time. * Earning ability, 3 points. Poverty-stricken couples grieve over everything. * Appearance, 2 points. If you don’t like the appearance, you may get bored of looking at it. ps: Love is not included in the scoring, because love is an overall feeling of multiple combinations, and everyone's favorite points are different, so it is difficult to evaluate objectively.

chunks.zh: 与其说门当户对，不如说成长经历一致或者相似更重要
chunks.en: Rather than family background, it's more important to have consistent or similar growing experiences.

chunks.zh: @liu731 畸形的市场，泡泡马上吹破了🥰
chunks.en: @liu731 A distorted market, the bubble is about to burst 🥰

chunks.zh: B 男只能找 C 女，B 女一般来说是看不上 B 男的。这就是市场。
chunks.en: B men can only find C women, and B women generally look down on B men. This is the market.

chunks.zh: 喜欢更重要，只要不是极端扶贫，以后可以一起共同奋斗如果只是门当户对，很容易厌烦，出轨离婚，甚至任何一个小的磨难都可以瓦解婚姻
chunks.en: Love is more important. As long as it's not extreme poverty alleviation, you can work hard together in the future. If it's just a good match, it's easy to get bored, cheat, divorce, and even a small hardship can disintegrate the marriage.

chunks.zh: 这种问题还是跟随自己内心，不要上网来问。你没有发现一个问题吗，网上关于婚姻和情感的这类帖子回复量是最大的，因为这是最没有门槛以及看法经验差异最大的一类问题，是个人都能插一嘴，没有任何参考价值。
chunks.en: You should follow your heart on this kind of question and don't ask it online. Have you noticed a problem? The reply volume of online posts about marriage and emotion is the largest, because this is the type of question with the lowest threshold and the greatest difference in opinions and experiences. Anyone can chime in, and it has no reference value.

chunks.zh: 楼主现在没那么爱她了 :)
chunks.en: The OP isn't that in love with her anymore :)

chunks.zh: 翻译😀：之前上头，现在玩多了觉得没意思了，开始考虑对方条件太差
chunks.en: Translation 😀: Was infatuated before, but now that I've had enough fun, I find it boring and am starting to consider that the other party's conditions are too poor.

chunks.zh: @momo1pm 别动不动就说别人太年轻，你的价值观就是对的吗？
chunks.en: @momo1pm Don't always say other people are too young. Is your value system the only correct one?

chunks.zh: @nathadai #19 我说句不好听的，如果这些杂费在工资占比很大，大概率你们两家没有啥差距。。
chunks.en: @nathadai #19 To be blunt, if these miscellaneous expenses account for a large proportion of your salary, then your two families probably don't have much of a gap...

chunks.zh: @r6cb 太年轻
chunks.en: @r6cb Too young

chunks.zh: 互相喜欢 > 门当户对；单向喜欢 < 门当户对
chunks.en: Mutual love > Compatibility; One-sided love < Compatibility

chunks.zh: 一般来说结婚选条件好的。当你问出这个问题的时候其实就是介意门当户对了。
chunks.en: Generally speaking, people choose those with better conditions for marriage. The fact that you're asking this question means you're actually concerned about social status.

chunks.zh: 补充下：你这个蹭饭，带孩子，经济支持，那你结社么婚啊，生了不养，你不配做父母，现在的人养了都不自己带的，可悲啊，谁投胎谁倒霉，我们家楼下那个老人，带两个娃，苦不堪言。我老婆就说了，养了不带何必生呢？干的时候爽，生出来要老人带的最终的结果就是等自己老了也没有自己的老年生活，余生带娃的命。
chunks.en: To add: if you're just looking for free meals, childcare, and financial support, then why get married? If you give birth but don't raise them, you don't deserve to be a parent. It's sad that people nowadays don't raise their own kids. It's bad luck for whoever is born into that. The old man downstairs in my building is taking care of two kids and is miserable. My wife said, 'Why give birth if you're not going to raise them?' It's fun when you're doing it, but if you have kids and then have the elderly take care of them, the end result is that you won't have your own old age life when you get old, and your remaining life will be spent raising kids.

chunks.zh: 性格，三观合不合的来最重要吧，不然门当户对了，两个人三观不对付过的也很难受的。
chunks.en: Isn't personality and whether your values align the most important thing? Otherwise, even if you are well-matched in terms of background, it will still be difficult to live with someone whose values don't align with yours.

chunks.zh: 我觉得喜欢是走进婚姻的前提，没有这个前提，婚姻生活是会缺乏原动力的。
chunks.en: I think love is the prerequisite for entering marriage. Without this prerequisite, married life will lack the original driving force.

chunks.zh: 家境很一般(家庭情况复杂)的女的建议慎重，特别是那种重组家庭，家庭情况非常混乱，其实如果有可能还是找一个喜欢自己的家庭情况简单一点家境一般的会比较好，楼主这种情况其实我很想说建议放弃，因为看到家庭情况复杂这句话，就有那种家庭很混乱的画面，这个得是巨富才可能处理好的。所以综上所述，结婚还是门当户对重要，楼主能找到一个家庭情况简单一点，家里多少可以帮扶一点，而且也很喜欢楼主的女的这种是最合适的。
chunks.en: I suggest being cautious with women from very average (complex family situations) backgrounds, especially those from reconstituted families with very chaotic family situations. Actually, if possible, it's better to find someone who likes you with a simpler family situation, even if their family background is average. In OP's situation, I really want to suggest giving up, because seeing the phrase 'complex family situation' brings to mind images of a very chaotic family, which could only be handled by someone extremely wealthy. Therefore, in summary, marriage is still about compatibility. It would be most suitable for the OP to find a woman with a simpler family situation, whose family can provide at least some help, and who also really likes the OP.

chunks.zh: deepseek:结婚时，喜欢和门当户对都很重要，但它们的侧重点不同。喜欢是婚姻的情感基础，决定了两个人能否在情感上相互吸引、理解和支持。没有感情的婚姻容易缺乏亲密感和幸福感。门当户对则更多涉及现实因素，如家庭背景、经济条件、教育水平等。相似的家庭背景和生活习惯有助于减少婚后摩擦，提升生活稳定性。理想的情况是两者兼顾，既有感情基础，又有相似的生活背景。如果必须选择，喜欢更为关键，因为感情是婚姻的核心动力，门当户对可以通过双方的努力去适应和调整。最终，婚姻需要双方共同经营，感情和现实条件都需要认真考虑
chunks.en: deepseek: When getting married, love and social status are both very important, but they have different focuses. Love is the emotional foundation of marriage, which determines whether two people can be emotionally attracted to, understand and support each other. Marriage without affection easily lacks intimacy and happiness. Social status involves more realistic factors, such as family background, economic conditions, education level, etc. Similar family background and living habits help reduce marital friction and improve life stability. The ideal situation is to have both, an emotional foundation and a similar living background. If you have to choose, love is more important, because emotion is the core driving force of marriage, and social status can be adapted and adjusted through the efforts of both parties. Ultimately, marriage requires the joint efforts of both parties, and both emotional and realistic conditions need to be carefully considered.

chunks.zh: 小老百姓就不要谈什么门当户对，不一定 3,5 年之后俩家情况就相反了，根本到不了门当户对的地步
chunks.en: Ordinary folks shouldn't even talk about social status. It's not certain that the situation of the two families won't be reversed in 3-5 years. Compatibility may simply not be attainable at all.
